item.description:
Wanna grab some grub before Waterfire?

Have reservations for eight for any folks wanting to join me. Restaurant week is coming up, and there are treats to behold at Waterfire so we're just lookin' for some good ol,' get it done dinner before hoofing it around town. And ya just can't go wrong with Joe's.

Website: http://www.joesameric...

Park at the Mall, we'll meet for dinner, and meet any additional Waterfire folks afterwards to explore the festival.

This is a reservation so no maybes, (sorry). Please keep your RSVP's accurate to not bump anyone else eager for a good burger. We'll meet between 6:00-6:15 outside the restaurant on Providence Place (the street:-)

Will send an email with my cell number to the yes's closer to the event to ensure we all find each other.

Looking forward to it!
Lisa
item.name: Pre-Waterfire dinner
